story: Once upon a time, there was a brave knight who saved the kingdom from a fierce dragon.
In a distant galaxy, a group of adventurers embarked on a perilous journey to find a legendary treasure.
Amelia woke up one morning to find herself in a mysterious forest, unsure of how she got there.
After years of searching, the archaeologist finally uncovered the lost city buried beneath the desert sands.
As the storm raged outside, Sarah curled up with a book by the fireplace, lost in a world of fantasy.
